Title: Prof. Dr.
Name: Col. Mohammed Mosleh Uddin
Bio:
Prof. Dr. Col. Mohammed Mosleh Uddin is a renowned clinical Hematologist and Hemato-Oncologist in Bangladesh. He has overall 20+ years of experience in medical practices. Prof. Dr. Col. Mohammed Mosleh Uddin is currently working as a Head of the Department of Bone Marrow Transplant Centre and Professor of Hematology Department of Combined Military Hospital (CMH), Dhaka. In addition, he is working at Islami Bank Hospital-Dhaka as a Senior Consultant. Prof. Dr. Col. Mohammed Mosleh Uddin completed his MBBS from Chattagram Medical College in 1991. He has completed his FCPS (Haematilogy) in 2003.
He has obtained Fellowship training on Bone Marrow Transplantation and Clinical Haematology from National University Hospital, Singapore in 2013 and Clinical fellowship on Stem Cell Transplantation from Tata Medical Centre (TMC), Kolkata, India in 2016.
Prof. Dr. Col. Mohammed Mosleh Uddin is a well-reputed doctor for providing treatment of different haematological diseases like Acute Leukemia (AML and ALL), CML, NHL, Hodgkinâ€™s lymphoma, Thalassaemia, ITP, Aplastic Anemia, Haemophilia, IDA etc. He is one of the refined Bone Marrow Transplant physician in Bangladesh, He has excellently performed 49 Stem cell transplantation with BMT(Bone Marrow Transplant) Team in BMT centre, CMH Dhaka. Among them, 38 were Autologous BMT and 11 were Allogenic BMT.
Address: Senior Haematologist and Stem Cell transplant Physician ,CMH Dhaka,Dhaka Cantonment, Bangladesh, Dhaka
